thread.title: EPL 2015: Georginio Wijnaldum does a Robert Lewandowski as Newcastle thump Norwich City
thread.title_full: EPL 2015: Georginio Wijnaldum does a Robert Lewandowski as Newcastle thump Norwich City | Latest News & Updates at Daily News & Analysis

author: ANI
title: EPL 2015: Georginio Wijnaldum does a Robert Lewandowski as Newcastle thump Norwich City
text:
Georginio Wijnaldum after scoring his fourth goal against Norwich City Getty Images Georginio Wijnaldum's four goals helped Newcastle to claim their first win of the Premier League season as they outclassed Norwich City 6-2 at St James' Park on Sunday.
Wijnaldum netted his first goal in the 14th minute to put his side in lead, before Norwhich forward Dieumerci Mbokani equalised the score just six minutes later, the Guardian reported.
Wijnaldum's second goal came in 26th minute of the game followed by Ayoze Perez goal in the 33rd minute that placed Newcastle in a commanding position. But just one minute later, midfielder Nathan Redmond smacked another goal for his side to make it 2-3 against Newcastle in the first half.
In the second half of the game, the hosts continued their dominating performance as forward player Aleksandar Mitrovic scored fourth goal for his side followed by Wijnaldum's brace to make it 6-2 against the visitors.
Newcastle will play their next match against Sunderland on October 25.
